entity.name: Prince Adewumi Adewale
entity.description: A digital strategist and developer focused on building intelligent, scalable solutions that merge technology and business strategy. This work is built on FOSS principles.

projects.name: AutoThinker
projects.description: An open-source AI platform that transforms concepts into actionable plans and project roadmaps. It streamlines the ideation-to-action pipeline for developers and entrepreneurs.

channels.description: Support our collection of FOSS projects through our Open Collective page. All funds are publicly accounted for and directly support project growth and maintenance.

plans.name: General AutoThinker Support
plans.description: A recurring contribution to cover essential operational costs, including API access and core maintenance specifically for the AutoThinker project.

plans.name: Autonomous Systems Grant
plans.description: A strategic one-time grant to fund the research and development of new autonomous task execution and reporting engines.
